Updated on 07/14/2010:

I created Waypoints on Topographic map for our hike. If you don't have any map on Long Trail, I highly recommend you print this out and bring it with you. I am not going to bring hard copy for you.
This includes elevation gain/loss graph as well, so you can easily check up and down on our hike.
MtAbe_Ellen_hike_07172010 Topo Map.




This is cross posted hiking event from my own meetup group in VT.

This hiking event covers 2 four thousands footers - Mt Abraham (4006 ft) & Mt Ellen (4083 ft) on Long Trail. Those mountains are located near Sugarbush Ski Resort. When weather cooperates, Mt Abe and the south peak of Lincoln Mtn offers one of the best panoramas on the entire Long Trail, ranging from nearby valley farms to NH's WHITES, 80 miles east. Due west is Mt Marcy and its ADKs neighbors.
To the south the Green Mountains may be visible as far south as Killington Peak.




Hiking Plan:

1. Car spot at the trailhead of Jerusalem Trail on Jim Dwire Road, Bristol at 8AM. This is the end point of our hike. Leave some cars here.

2. Drive other cars to Lincoln Gap Parking Lot of Long Trail on Lincoln Gap Road, Bristol. Arrive there around 8:30AM. Start hike no later than 8:45AM.

3. Hike in 1.7 miles to reach Battell Shelter, another steep 0.9 miles to get to the summit of Mt Abraham with some scrambling up rock slabs. Lunch or Snack at the summit of Mt Abe.

4. After lunch/snack, we'll enjoy ridge hike approx. 3.7 miles on LT north [ hike through Lincoln Peak (3975 ft), Nancy Hanks Peak (3812 ft) and Cutts Peak (4022 ft) ] to reach the summit of Mt Ellen.

5. Hike out 1.8 miles on Long Trail North from Mt Ellen, take left turn on Jerusalem Trail for 2.4 miles to return to the Parking Lot on Jim Dwire Road.



Hiking Level:

Moderate to difficult
Total mileage: 10.5 miles (Within 10.5 miles, approximately 5.5 miles are ridge hike)
Hike Time: 7+ hours at least
Hiking pace: slow to moderate



Suggested Meetup Location:

1) Car Spot location: At the trailhead of Jerusalem Trail on Jim Dwire Road, Bristol, VT at 8:00AM.

This is the google map from the Cap Spot location at Jim Dwire Rd, Bristol, VT to Lincoln Gap Road, Bristol, VT.



Weather check point is 7/16, 9PM.
If you have any questions, please feel free to drop me email.

Event Organizer,
Tomoko Nakajima



Update Info on 6/23/2010:
My hiking friend, Edward, told me that there is a friendly Inn for hikers nearby for Mt Abe/Ellen hike.
It's called Hyde Away Inn in Waitsfield, VT (800-777-HYDE).
